title: Flash Gordon Strange Adventure Magazine v01n01 [1936-12] {JS-beb}
description: This is a rather poor scan of a very rare pulp - some text is missing due to damaged pages. Though a second issue was planned (and advertised), no more issues were published after the first one. CONTENTS: Flash Gordon Strange Adventure Magazine [v1 #1, December 1936] (10¢, 96pp+, 7¼" x 10¼" s/s, cover by Fred Meagher) 6 · The Master Of Mars [Flash Gordon] · James Edison Northfield · na; given as by James Edison Northford on the story itself. 68 · The Saga Of The “Smokepot” · R. R. Winterbotham · ss 77 · The Last War · R. R. Botham [pseudonym of R. R. Winterbotham] · ss 79 · The Man Without A Brain · R. C. Vance & Frank Kenneth Young · ss
